title: Apps disappear from the recent apps list over time
content:
Steps to reproduce:
Turn on safe mode
Clear out recent apps and open 10 apps
Leave the device alone for some time (I do this overnight)
Check if the 10 apps are still in your recent apps list
Expected behavior:
10 apps in the recent apps list

Actual behavior:
~4 apps in the recent apps list

I've been through 2 replacement pixel 3's and they all have the same issue.

The issue also happens on pixel 3a.
